page.title: 03LOCAL INDUSTRY
page.content: THE MAIN INDUSTRY OF THE AREA IS FARMING. WE COUNTED THE FIELDS IN OUR AREA AND FOUND 92 CONTAINED WHEAT; 43 BARLEY; 19 SUGAR BEET; 16 POTATOES; 15 PEAS; 13 OIL SEED RAPE; 5 GRASS; 3 EACH RED BEET AND LETTUCE; 2 FALLOW. A QUANTITY OF RADISHES ARE GROWN IN PLASTIC GREENHOUSES AND A FEW DAIRY COWS ARE KEPT AT BELTOFT. WEST BUTTERWICK HAS A FOOD PROCESSING PLANT USING THE OWNER'S LOCAL GROWN PRODUCE, AND EMPLOYING ABOUT 45 PEOPLE MAINLY ON AN OCCASIONAL BASIS. THERE IS A FACTORY MAKING FIBREGLASS MOULDINGS WHICH EMPLOYS 24 PEOPLE. A SMALL FURNITURE MANUFACTURER ALSO HAS PREMISES IN THE VILLAGE MAKING QUALITY HAND_MADE ITEMS. EAST BUTTERWICK HAS A RIDING STABLE AND 2 HOTELS. BELTOFT IS ENTIRELY DEPENDANT ON FARMING. THE AREA HAS A LARGE NUMBER OF SELF_EMPLOYED BUILDING WORKERS.
